Windlord/Nightlight::

Windlord saw at Serge ran where he and Nighlight were. Nightlight 
felt weaker with every second, she lay in the ground and.

Windlord moved between Nightlight and Serge, the hawk 
screamed "Choose other way to run out here, or you'll regret it"


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "SOULSTICE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Serge isn't decapitated in robot mode...
> 
> BIC: Serge is clearing some ground as he frantically runs to get 
away from this evil, evil, place!...
